text: The national flag of the Vatican City is also the flag of the Holy See. It was created in 1929 as a direct order from Pope Pius XI. == Appearance == It has two vertical stripes in light yellow and white. The original flag had yellow and red stripes. The flag also features the Vatican City's coat of arms. Category:Vatican City Vatican City Category:Bicolour flags Category:Flags with coats of arms
title: Flag of Vatican City
